DOC.HEADLINE: REGIONAL ROUNDUP : FORTUNE PETROLEUM TAKING $ 2.68-MILLION SPECIAL CHARGE
DOC.TEXT: Fortune Petroleum Corp . in Agoura Hills said it will take a onetime special charge of $ 2.68 million in the fourth quarter of 1993 to reflect lower oil prices -- $ 700 # 000 more_than it had previously announced . Fortune Petroleum , an independent oil and gas exploration production company , said it increased the amount after reviewing a new report on reserves from Fortune ' s independent engineering firm . Fortune Petroleum said that by taking this onetime charge , instead of spreading_out the effect of lower oil prices in 1993 over the next several years , its earnings will be higher in 1994 and in the future .
